Verses: 1 thunmaarkkarudaiya Aalosanaiyil Nadavaamalum, Paavigaludaiya Vazhiyil Nillaamalum, Pariyaasakkaarar Utkaarum Idaththil Utkaaraamalum,
2 karththarudaiya Vedhaththil Piriyamaayirundhu, Iravum Pagalum Avarudaiya Vedhaththil Dhiyaanamaayirukkira Manushan Baakkiyavaan.
3 avan Neerkkaalgalin Oramaai Nadappattu, Than Kaalaththil Than Kaniyaith Thandhu, Ilaiyudhiraadhirukkira Maraththaippoliruppaan; Avan Seyvadhellaam Vaaikkum.
4 thunmaarkkaro Appadiyiraamal, Kaatrup Parakkadikkum Padharaippol Irukkiraargal.
5 aagaiyaal Thunmaarkkar Niyaayaththeerppilum, Paavigal Needhimaangalin Sabaiyilum Nilainirpadhillai.
6 karththar Needhimaangalin Vazhiyai Arindhirukkiraar; Dhunmaarkkarin Vazhiyo Azhiyum.
